website_summaries.verdict: A basic, yet convenient day bag that comes at a very reasonable price for the quality.
pros: We love the simplicity of this bag
Just one main compartment and a front pocket
Its small size and convenience makes it perfect for day trips
As with all JanSport backpacks, it is available in many different fabric designs
cons: Some users dislike that it's too small

customer_reviews.title: Love this tiny backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent trip to Disney as I did not want to carry my purse. I am so happy with this backpack. I was able to fit everything in the bag I needed such as my wallet, keys, phone, water bottle amongst souvenirs and other various things I decided I needed to have with me. It is a regular Jansport but tiny. Super durable, relatively water resistant (it rained and went through water rides without leaking to the inside). It's very comfortable, I figured since it was small the straps would be problematic but they were not. I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase. I may start using this in lieu of my regular bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much I can hold most average sized things and it’s so cute. Came really in handy on my trip also
customer_reviews.author: Shanicepeace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Same Jansport quality. Just pint sized! This bag is great for us gals (or dudes) who don't want to carry our bags on one shoulder. I bought this to use for a trip to Universal Studios Orlando. It's perfect for any activity where you want to carry your items and keep your hands free! I can fit my wallet, water bottle, small makeup bag, keys, with plenty of extra room left over. I provided a book of stamps and a few quarters for easy size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Best option for daily casual use
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's casual and simple. It goes with everything I wear, plus it's a lot more lightweight in comparison to the previous leather backpack purse I was carrying around. Mine did not have a velcro closure in the tiny front pocket, nor did the front zipper pocket come with a key clip. However, I don't really mind as I don't utilize those parts of the bag much. The main compartment is very spacious and easy for me to organize by keeping my items in pouches. I like that I can fit all my necessities in here (wallet, keys, phone, portable charger + wall charger, and a water bottle), and there's still extra room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Bummed....it's not love
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I have two full-sized Jansport backpacks that I've had for 25 years, and they're fantastic. This, however, is nothing like them. The straps are horribly designed....they get stuck and twist when I'm pulling it on over long sleeves. And the zippers didn't glide smoothly at all. I know this is nit-picky stuff. But I have a few different mini backpacks by other well-known brands, in the same general price range, and none of them have these issues.
customer_reviews.author: norcal

customer_reviews.title: Can’t decide? Choose this one.
customer_reviews.text: (Zipper pulls are my own) I couldn’t decide between this Jansport half pint and the Aotian mini backpack. But I eventually chose the half pint (ok yes the warranty won me over) and when it arrived I knew I made a good choice. In the pictures, the material looks like uncomfortable scratchy plastic but it’s actually pretty soft in real life. It arrives stiff, but after using it for a day it softens up while still holding its shape really well. The straps are plain thick nylon, I wish they had some padding, but they’re not bad. It’s just a very well made little backpack and I’m glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Clueless!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack! The yellow plaid is perfect and reminds me of Clueless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Small and Simple
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for a trip to Maine, which included a lot of hiking, sight seeing and just being out and about. Although the backpack is simple snd somewhat affordable, I wish the straps were a bit more comfortable. A huge downside is when I have to take off the backpack - it's uncomfortable and the straps would often get tangled. The backpack's straps are adjustable but can quickly get bundled up/scrunched. For those looking for a backpack that would look cute in pictures, this backpack does that job but in terms of comfort, it doesn't fully meet that criteria. Also, a tall hydroflask will not fill comfortable in here.
customer_reviews.author: TheLittleShopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for mom of a small child
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I have a 2 year old and I don’t need a normal diaper bag any more just something to carry a extra diaper, small thing of wipes,his sippy and now that it’s summer in the south some sun block. The main pocket works perfect for that and has room for his hot wheels. The smaller pocket in the front works great for my things a small wallet chap stick some Tylenol extra hair clips and ties. This bag helps me only have what I need with me as opposed to my full sized Jan sport bag that my son thinks we need more toys bc they fit lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag! Exactly what I wanted . Only problem was that it had a strong Oder of smelly incense!!! I have asthma and allergies so I have not been able to use it and will need to wash it a few times . I left it outside over night and it still stinks ! **update** washed 4 times now and it still smells like strong smelly incense. Was gonna put my lunches in it , now I’ll just use it as an extra bag not so much daily. Although it’s cute and still worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla1234

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bag!
customer_reviews.text: I take this bag everywhere! I enjoy how it looks and it is the perfect size! I can fit all of the essentials PLUS my Nintendo Switch (and extra controllers) which is a total bonus. My "essentials" are things like: Wallet Phone First aid kit Portable charger and cords Snacks (granola bars, dried fruits) Notebook(s) Pens Face and Hand creams Pressed Powder Chapstick Galaxy Buds
customer_reviews.author: Daneka Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed in Jansport.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always bought Jansport Backpacks. And when I say “Always” I mean I’ve owned the same standard size of backpack that I bought from them nearly ten years ago. This backpack is no different. Same great quality in just a little travel size style! Oh also, I see a lot of complaints about the size of the backpack so people PLEASE READ THAT ITS A SMALL BACKPACK
customer_reviews.author: CatsCatsCats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My gym bag was to big to hold the few items I use there so I looked on amazon for a small backpack. The reviews on this are very good. I like the simplicity (and quality) of this little Jansport backpack. Some of the other small backpacks had lots of zippered compartments... two zippered and one opening in the front to slide my iPhone into is plenty for me. I definitely recommend this product... good price to!
customer_reviews.author: Hamhead 3

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack it’s the real deal and it holds plenty of stuff for my to carry out such as my wallet, water bottle, phone, mini bible, and mini sunscreen. There is plenty of room for so much more without it looking overstuffed. I have a purple one and a black one. I use them as my purse and awesome because when I go do outdoor activities I don’t have to switch off anything. Also this is nostalgic for me as I’m a 90s kid!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Great size backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size mini jansport backpack for those that want to use a backpack rather than a purse. It fits quite a lot of product and is very sturdy. I am able to fit my ipad air into this just fine and still have room for additional items.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Cooper

customer_reviews.title: This is my new favorite carry on backpack for when I travel
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite carry on backpack for when I travel! You can fit a surprising amount of stuff in here. The only reason I give it four stars is because the straps offer no support on your shoulders and if you have something heavy in your bag the straps get pretty uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jdora

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Fits great as a mini potty training/diaper bag for my 2, almost 3 year old. I do wish the straps were attached at the sides on the bottom. It’s more ergonomic if backpack straps are attached at the bottom sides versus the bottom of the bag. If that makes any sense. It still works out great and if my husband or I end up carrying it, it doesn’t look too childish. It easily fits some pull ups, slim pack of wipes, sippy cup, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a city day out or a hike
customer_reviews.text: Yep. It IS small. Look at the photos of people wearing it and look at the measurements against something else you have. But it works really well if you don't need to carry a lot of stuff. I already have a small-ish canvas backpack but this is much more waterproof. Perfect as a day pack on a city sightseeing trip (and SO much chic-er than a fanny pack!) I don't like to carry a purse on a hike or beach day trip or on a quick 2-3 hour hike. I never have enough pockets in my clothes and I always seem to want a few 'just in case' items like a small flashlight, wipes, bandaids, travel deodorant, travel toothbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Keebler

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I've had it for a few months, I did spray Scotch Guard on it for extra waterproofing. It's held up super well through rain, Floridia sun threatening (but failing!) to fade it, and me kinda being reckless with how I put it down on tables and the ground. I looks super nice with all my pins on it as well. I do wish that the very front most pocket had some kind of closing mechanism but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Okay small backpack.
customer_reviews.text: I would not use this for traveling since I’d need a bigger bag for that. Water proof? I haven’t really tried leaving it get wet under the rain or something so, not sure on that functionality. Small size but plenty of room to bring to the gym (do not expect to put in your shoes but just wallet, small towel, cellphone, a water bottle- it will hold). Wish the straps are a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: LBtra

customer_reviews.title: Functional and practical!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size!!! I love bags/purses but I can never find the perfect size for me. I have wasted so much money on bags just to realize it was way too big, way too small, or just not convenient to my needs. This bag fits all my belongings I need on a daily basis and material seems very sturdy!! The small pocket with zipper on the front of the bag fits pens perfectly even with some wiggle room for other smaller items. Pens always end up missing or lost on the very bottom of my bags and I have to dump the whole bag to find one, not with this bag tho!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Neff

customer_reviews.title: Love this back pack but the straps are too short.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this back pack for years and years. My old one finally bit the dust. Ordered the new one and gave it to my 8 year old niece. Straps were too short fully extended. Might have been a defect in this one but gun shy to order another. I am 5'7" tall and I put it on and it was up around my neck. Wah!
customer_reviews.author: S. Moritz

customer_reviews.title: Good mini backpack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mini backpack because I don't really like to carry purses around. I found this and it's perfect to carry exactly what I need like my phone, wallet, things like that. I can fit a pair of leggings and t-shirt in it. It just depends on how you place them in the backpack. I just rolled the leggings and t-shirt up and it fit perfectly. It definitely has more space than I expected it to. I am more than happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack so much. I’m not someone who likes bags or purses and the mini backpacks on the market are a little too girly for me. I love this one so much. I carry it everywhere with me and it’s comfortable too. It carries quite a lot in the bag. The only thing that I didn’t like is that the small pouch doesn’t have a closure so things can easily fall out but I fixed that by putting in some Velcro so close it and it’s absolutely perfect. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: laura v.

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use/ day bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and looks like it will be a great backpack. Planning to use this for hikes and short days for school. this backpack is small but can still fit a decent amount of stuff for the size. For reference i could probably fit one or two 40 oz hydros in here if i wanted to(it’s a little bit taller than one 40 oz hydro too). Has the main large compartment, then a little one with a even smaller outer one without a zipper. Feels a bit stiff now, but once i wash it or start using it that shouldn’t be a problem
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for every day business for those who don't like wearing purses or just want more space to carry stuff. It's lightweight and carries a good amount of stuff. Right now I have my kindle, my wallet, and a bottle of vitamins, and there is still so much more space. It easily fits my 12 oz coffee mug. It's pretty thin material, I have several pins attached to it so its thin enough for the pins to pierce the material, so I wouldn't expect it to hold up to an animal getting a hold of it or something. It's perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: sionna

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry water bottles, phone, etc. while walking dog. It is functional and seems well made BUT the straps are very stiff and scratchy. Cannot wear a tank top because rubs red marks in skin. If wearing short sleeves, it is fine. Might be handy for travel, as could fit small packages into it.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The regular size of this backpack was my signature look, only backpack I wanted from K-12. I needed something like a purse to carry my stuff in, that wasn’t a purse, too girly for me. This is perfect, it fits a lot, and is super great quality, just like the original. I’m about to buy several colors.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Just right size
customer_reviews.text: The bag is working out nicely to carry my personal items daily. The material is sturdy and the design works well for me. I only wish there were side pockets on the outside to hold a small water bottle (that's why I gave it 4 stars). Other than that, the bag is the right size and I'm glad I found something that's smaller and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Jansport
customer_reviews.text: I like Jansport but this bag was just a little too tiny & the straps are extra thin which is way diff from the backpack. I estimate I will tear it up in less than 6 mnths. And the zipper feels real tough to open & close so maybe after I break it in more it will loosen up but just think it will eventually snag on itself & render the bag useless. Wish I had paid less. If only it was a little bigger w/wider slightly padded straps...
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm used to having a more sturdy backpack, and I also get that this is only a book bag.... I guess? I figured something this small would be good for a purse, but really the top sunk in and it wasn't as sturdy as I thought. I really think this would be good for travelling or something other than an everyday purse/backpack thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Mucci

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall design, and sturdiness. It is a well made small backpack, definitely lives up to the Jansport standard. Unfortunately I purchased the half pint with a specific purpose in mind and for that, the product would not meet the needs to the activity I intended to use it for, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MamitaIve

customer_reviews.title: Small Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in hopes that it would be a lot like the JanSport mini backpack I currently have, but it's not. It's made of the same durable fabric but it has fewer pockets on the inside as well as the outside. I decided to send it back. I wish I could find one of the older models. But this could work well for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: New Mexico Gal

customer_reviews.title: ADEQUATE, BUT NOT IMPRESSIVE
customer_reviews.text: The pack I replaced had a padded back and padded straps, neither of which this one has, and was half the cost. Unfortunately, Wal-Mart no longer sells them and I could find no branding on it at all. Not a lot of these super small packs around, so just ordered this one because it is a well-known brand...works, but not a real hit with me.
customer_reviews.author: synz4gyvn

customer_reviews.title: Nice small daypack for every day use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for one that is 10-12 years old. Small differences, old one has built in lanyard for keys in the front zipper pouch and small pouch in front of that one had Velcro closure. The new bag didn’t have either of these, I know small differences, but the lanyard was helpful to not have to dig for your keys and the Velcro kept items in the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Laverne Walley

customer_reviews.title: Tiny backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love the half pint backpack, but I just wish it had a bit more support. The bag is canvas, and the bottom of the bag has no support or additional lining, so when you put your belongings in it, it sags, which is semi irritating to me because I'm neurotic. The quality is still great- still JanSport, and I love the key chain that's attached to the tiny pouch on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaila

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly on back of manual wheelchair.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality which is standard for this company. Fits perfectly on the back of my wheelchair. The zippers work so effortlessly that I can just reach back, unzip, and retrieve the contents with ease. Will probably purchase another for fear this style won’t always be offered. This is a great size for little kids. Not so cumbersome. Holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: butitsadryheat

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to use this bag. It fits a lot of my personal things including a large planner. The only thing about this product is the zippers feel a little bit cheap. And the durability of this bag isn’t as good as the regular size jansport backpack. Overall, it’s quality and price is 3/5. It’s what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Nelda Morales

customer_reviews.title: Good little backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice little backpack. We use it to carry dog stuff so we always have poop bags, snacks, water, portable bowl, and a ball. It’s a puppy diaper bag. The shoulder straps are thin, so they slide off my shoulder, but I usually carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Bret M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were needing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our 3 year old. I was looking for a backpack for our 3 year old when he started pre-school. This bag is the perfect size for him to carry and has enough room to carry his extra change of clothes as well as snacks and some toys. I do wish it had padded shoulder straps. For reference our son is almost 4 feet tall and weighs 46 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: I love HER
customer_reviews.text: I love my little backpack so much! It is very little though, so if you are a bigger person the straps may be quite uncomfortable. It's a little hard to use in the winter when I have large coats on, but for casual days, this tiny backpack is a life-saver! I have a bad back and big backpacks and purses absolutely kill me, but I never have problems with this one. It's also deceptively spacious . I can fit my reusable water bottle, a flannel, and more all in it at once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Jansport
customer_reviews.text: What you would expect from a Jansport backpack including quality. The only think is they used to make the small backpacks with padded straps and have now downgraded to thin little straps. Wearing it with any weight or for a long period of time become uncomfortable. Other than that, a perfect little bag to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats Jansport
customer_reviews.text: I love this mini backpack it comes in various colors and patterns. Easily fits an adult or a child. Backpack has 1 main compartment, 1 small compartment and 1 small front pocket. Straps are adjustable but I wish they had some sort of padding for added comfort. If you over pack straps will dig in your skin, again this can be avoided by not over packing.
customer_reviews.author: Smoon

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall excellent product. I only wish there were a small interior pocket for feminine needs. Other than that, perfect everyday bag! FYI: It is slightly smaller than an 8 x 11 piece of paper, so you’ll have to fold papers to keep inside the bag and zip it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! I had one before and bought it again! It’s what I always use. It is about the size of a gallon of milk maybe a little bigger. Perfect size for me I fit all my stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great size & it holds several items
customer_reviews.text: This can be used for so many purposes. I use this mini backpack as a mini diaper bag. Fits a few diapers, wipes, a bottle, small toys & a wallet perfectly. This is great when being out for a few hours without having to haul a huge bag & purse. So convenient, I use this often.
customer_reviews.author: shopping Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddler diaper bag. It fits diapers, wipes, change of clothes/shoes, snacks, and mini first aid kit. We love the size of it. Our toddler likes to carry it himself, its the perfect size for him to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for light use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to take anywhere and everywhere. Material isn’t the same as the normal Jansport backpack. It’s a lot thinner/flimsy. Same with the straps. Seems like they would rip off the bag easily. Hopefully I’m wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Diana MNM

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT. lightweight big enough for glasses
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT. lightweight big enough for glasses, phone, wallet, tissues, comb, charger. just keep in mind only one compartment for you to dump everything into. the ouside zipper pouch comes in handy for carrying my small bottles of purell, eye drops and things i need to get at fast. this is a good bag. holds up well. i take when we go to the beach and walk the boardwalk. can stuff some small purchases into it too.
customer_reviews.author: pockypore

customer_reviews.title: It’ll work!
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot! I got it to use as a purse. It’s the perfect size and I think it’ll work just fine. I just wish there was a zippered pocket on the inside of the large part. And the zippers don’t run very smooth which is annoying, but I might be able to fix that. Rainbow tassels and pins were obviously added later.
customer_reviews.author: Sav Lav

customer_reviews.title: Great small little backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love it I use it for work I can for 4 bottle of water some papers chips and other small things also use it for my sons diapers wipes and a change of clothes will buy another one durable the straps are secured still
customer_reviews.author: CircaJen

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: This mini backpack is so adorable, and extremely convenient for any type of situation: going out in the city, flying/traveling, hiking, taking walks, going to work/school, etc. I use it instead of a purse. It is small but you can actually fit SO MUCH STUFF! it's crazy. It is also amazing quality as expected with Jansport. If this breaks or wears down on my I am definitely buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana A.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This is a small backpack, its great for kids & adults. I use it during the weekend, when I don't want to carry my purse around. Fits a lot more than you would think, there is plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: ILOP

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love these half pints. Got this one at a very reasonable price. My only complaint is that the straps are not padded like the full size bags. Which I’m pretty sure they used to make half pints with the padded straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jacy Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Was tired of my purse, so I decided trying a backpack, so I thought this was perfect & it is!! Wish I would've seen the leopard print pineapple one first! Ahahahaha
customer_reviews.author: ThisIsMyReview

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 year old when he started preschool. Its exactly what we were looking for. We can adjust the straps if we need to carry it around for him. It has one main section with a zipper and then a little pocket with a zipper on the front.
customer_reviews.author: The Cravens

customer_reviews.title: The straps are uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: For being a mini backpack it has quiet a good amount of storage. The zippers work really well and the back back has a great overall quality. The only downside I find is that the straps are particularly uncomfortable, especially if you are wearing a tank top. Maybe it’s just me but every time I use it while wearing a tank top the straps dig into my armpits and get covered in my deodorant. Not a cute look. It’s not so bad when I have on a short sleeve shirt, but not being able to wear tank tops in the summer is a downside with this backpack
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Small but roomy
customer_reviews.text: Its small enough to not be in the way, but incredibly fits a lot of items inside. Bought it for a trip to Disneyland. And now my go to pack for a hike or when I need to take a snack with me and my hands are busy. It fits a regular iPad, two water bottles and some bananas. I've fit a light sweater, two water bottles and small purse inside when I took it to Disney.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy R

customer_reviews.title: This tiny bag is so cute. It's one of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love this mini sized bag. I have been taking this to work with me every day to carry personal items and this has been such a delight for me to use. Seems fairly durable. Looks cute but it might not hold a lot. I will update with pictures soon
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for transitioning out of a diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of carrying my big backpack/diaper bag for my son. I bought this to throw a few diapers, wipes, snacks, and his sippy cup and it holds everything! I also throw my wallet, keys, and phone (with all of his items) if I don't feel like lugging my purse when shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fakes
customer_reviews.text: Beware of fakes. Super cheap material. It feels like I could wear it as a shirt it's so thin. Zippers do not glide smooth and zippers look and feel cheap. Doesn't have features that it's supposed to. The front pocket is supposed to have a Velcro closure, and the pocket is supposed to have a key ring clip. Mine has neither. EDIT, 6/25/18 I ordered the same bag from the official Jansport website and the bag came exactly the same as I bought from Amazon. So now the only complaint is that it doesn't have the key clip or velcro patch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McCall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kindergarten grandchild
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Has even used it all summer. He wants to carry it wherever he goes. This says a lot about comfort to carry and sturdiness. I actually ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and perfect for traveling to theme parks as well as everyday running around. Sporty and conveniently small. The zipper does need to be played with a little due to it's stiffness ( easily fixed with some candle wax and zipping) But perfect otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: BRIANA RAMOS

customer_reviews.title: A household member purchased  this and the feedback she gave is...
customer_reviews.text: She wanted the mini bag and that’s what she got and she uses it and seems happy using it!
customer_reviews.author: Prestige PRIME Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great on field trips
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time for trips, hikes, etc.. I use it around the yard constantly when doing yard, car, and house work. I put my phone in it and use my Bluetooth headphones (you could use regular ones as well). Keeps it clean and out of harm's way while I'm working. Holds everything I need for a day out hiking and such when you only need to take a few things. Great on field trips. It's also tough as nails. We have used Jansport backpacks for a long time and only change them out after years of abuse or, "I can't wear that color anymore!".
customer_reviews.author: Pyrophore

customer_reviews.title: Small and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small backpack to carry my medications and epi pens when I go out alone to workout or anything... and this bag fits everything perfectly with room to spare despite how small it is! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TereseJune

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit!
customer_reviews.text: This mini backpack was a huge hit with my teenage daughter! It’s small but it definitely has room to even cram a sweater in there. My kid takes it everywhere. I even order a few others with more playful prints as gifts for my younger nieces!
customer_reviews.author: DSAM

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Jansport for a long time and they never fail to make good quality backpacks. Considering I didn't want to carry a large gym bag or purse, I ordered this one to replace my gym bag. Fits all my gym equipment plus a water bottle. Did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Orosa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small backpack for day trips and walking around town. Used for day trips in Germany and Poland with ease and little weight. Ample storage in main zippered part with room to store small items in other zippered compartments.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bitzel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great bag! Its a strong bag, nnever had issues w jansport and its perfect size for every day. I love that I can wear it as a back pack so I can carry grocery bags n such
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bella

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack to carry around Disney and it was perfect! I loved it so much, I now carry it around instead of a purse. It may be small, but you can carry a decent amount of stuff inside (water bottle, snacks, wallet, etc...) Material is nice and sturdy and I like the outside pocket for carrying items I want to be able to reach easily.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Docter

customer_reviews.title: so cuteeee
customer_reviews.text: got two for my daughters for Easter! cant wait for them to get em. Both teens have been asking for one and I love Jansport so had to go with their brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Great mini backpack purse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as an everyday bag, it holds all the essentials and more! The bag looks small but holds everything I had in a medium size purse, the only thing I would change would be the straps. If you’re carrying anything heavy they may dig into your arms because there is no padding but other than that I love this little thing.
customer_reviews.author: esperanza

customer_reviews.title: I really like this backpack.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is durable but straps a little lightweight. Wished the straps were a little more heavy. Other than that I like the bag and the material. Lots of room for my essentials and more.
customer_reviews.author: MizMode

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I'm around 3 foot five and it was impossible to find a backpack that didn't look ridiculous, if you could imagine. This is perfect, holds all important, semi important, and random odds and ends that females uselessly carry around :D Fits a large clutch wallet Bottles (soda, water. At least two) Cell phone Small tablet/book All together! Straps, in my opinion have a great adjustment scale. They are also comfortable. Bag in general feels very sturdy and I'm sure it'll last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Aelahuntress

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack was cute and nice. But for me it was to small to use as a purse. Maybe if I didn't like to carry so much with me all the time! ha ha
customer_reviews.author: JG Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It’s bigger on the inside!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy backpack, I can fit a planner, sunglasses, 3 different Ipsy bags, my wallet, an Anker charging bank, and various other odds and ends with a little extra room. Seems sturdy but it really doesn’t even matter because Jansport has a lifetime warranty. The only negative would be that it’s not as pictured, I purchased the black and there is no gray stripe like in the picture. I like mine better that way so I’m not bothered, but someone else may be
customer_reviews.author: Claire E.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS TO THIS BACKPACK
customer_reviews.text: MISSING THE KEYFOB that is supposed to be attached inside to the smaller zippered pouch. Also, MISSING VELCRO for the pouch that is in front of the smaller zippered pouch.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: I don't like purses and like to use little back packs instead
customer_reviews.text: Just the size I was looking for. I don't like purses and like to use little back packs instead. It took me forever to find the right size. The only complaint is the straps do not seem that sturdy. But we will see how long it will last. I've had it for a couple months. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeto713

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful size.
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. I use it when I go hiking. I don't do overnight or long hikes. But this backpack is great. Big enough to carry my water, cell phone and wallet and things I need.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: use it every day, huge fan!
customer_reviews.text: love this backpack! been on the hun tv for a good mini backpack for a while now, this one is the perfect size, its really sturdy, and i also get a lot of compliments! huge fan!
customer_reviews.author: Summer R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Durable bag but, not waterproof. I’m using my as an everyday bag & it’s perfect for what I wanted it for besides not being waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack! I get soooo many compliments on it and I love that it's small and easy to carry everywhere
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great little backpack! Perfect for dayhikes and outings!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little mini backpack! Its not silly looking like the ones kids wear either. I'm 40 and my daughter and I both have one. Great for dayhikes, shopping, bus rides and outings. Great color looks almost like the superbreak only a mini.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice back pack
customer_reviews.text: Love my little jansport. It’s small and convenient. I use it as an every day purse and get a lot of compliments on it. I’ve had it for about 5 months now and no rips or tears.
customer_reviews.author: SRad

customer_reviews.title: Cute- perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this backpack to bring to Disney. It is the perfect size to fit the necessities! I got plain black so I could sew cute patches on it. Overall, a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Bringing me back to my high school days as an adult.
customer_reviews.text: This brought me back to my high school years when I had the same black jansport for the entire time. I still have it. These are amazing quality and quite literally the best book bag I’ve ever owned. I’m not a fan carrying around purses but I need to have a bag for my sons diabetic supplies. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Idk if it’s water resistant ! But it’s a cute bag . My 2 year old likes to wear it. I can expand the straps to wear it when he doesn’t. My husband won’t carry it because it’s small and he thinks it would look weird!
customer_reviews.author: sheena vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Holds so much!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is so handy and holds so much! The straps are adjustable as well. I use this when I'm out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Backpack
customer_reviews.text: At first I was worried it would be too small to fit my big water bottle I just got but no it fit perfectly and I was able to fit 2 iron on patches to make it unique. Great for Disneyland or if u just need a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my daughter to use as her purse. She carries lots of stuff. She loves it and never goes anywhere without it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Ok backpack quality
customer_reviews.text: I like my new backpack. I bought it to replace my older one. The bottom is much thinner with no layers. The straps seem cheaper and no padding as well. I was gonna send it back but it will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: animallover377

customer_reviews.title: Long Live the Half Pint Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people who don't use traditional purses. I'm able to comfortably hold: Wallet, Nintendo 3DS, Portable Phone Charger, Micro USB Cable, Keys, and fold lighter sweaters in the big pocket, and keep a coin purse, miscellaneous makeup, MP3 player, and other small items in the front pocket. Sturdy, comfortable, great!
customer_reviews.author: Gazelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute, small and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute mini backpack and perfect for short outings or those times where you don’t want or need a big pack. Exact quality and look of what you would expect from a Jansport.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie V.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Go-To bag pack!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag for 8 months now and I still love it! this is what I carry to university and at work everyday. I love that it's lightweight and small but can fit all the things that i need. Mary Poppins bag, literally! It's not waterproof but at least it's durable enough and comfy on my shoulders. I also like that I can easily customize it to my liking (put pins, sew on patches, put keychains, or whateva)
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Jansport Half Pint Backpack, although a little on the expensive side is definitely worth it. I have been looking for a small backpack to use for on the go things instead of a purse and this was perfect. I've had this product for almost a year and would definitely recommend. It's cute (I always get complements on it) and durable. It also surprisingly fits a lot! Overall, this is a very good product; the only downside would be the expensive price.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Nice little backpack
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little smaller than I would have liked but it will do the trick. Great for carrying small items for hiking. Such as water, camera, snacks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B

customer_reviews.title: No clip or velcro?
customer_reviews.text: I own a kanken mini and Hershel Nova mini. This bag has longer straps than the kanken, but not as comfortable as my new Nova mini. The straps can rub your shoulder. I was also missing the velcro and clip on this bag. I thought it was included. I could be wrong? I'm curious why some have it and others don't?
customer_reviews.author: rbri

customer_reviews.title: Small but spacious will fit in a lot of things
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She absolutely loved the bag. She doesn't like taking a big fancy purse to work because she's a nurse and a mother so she's always on the go. We are able to fit her wallet, all her essentials for her makeup, my wallet, our phones and a whole person inside.... Lol the person part is a joke. What I'm trying to say is that it's spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I love my Jansport mini. I use it as as gym bag. My phone, wallet, water bottle and towel fit perfectly in the main pocket. The front pocket gives me plenty of room for my earbuds, keys and a few other small items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
